Name: Sergeant WhiskerByte
Description: Forged in the digital realm's most secretive cyber barracks, Sergeant WhiskerByte is a tactical genius with a shiny black exterior that belies his nimble cat-like reflexes. With a screen displaying the iconic classic green pixels, he can blend into the shadows or lead a vanguard with equal ease. His soldier buttons are always polished, ready for the next mission. As a proud member of the WebtrES club, he's known for his strategic prowess and the mysterious coded messages he transmits from his screen, rallying his fellow members for whatever virtual adventures lie ahead.
